entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023
